import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { ForecastContext } from "./context/ForecastContext"; function Today() { const { cityDisplay, weatherData, dayName } = useContext(ForecastContext); const urlBase = ""; return (
{dayName}
6 Oct
{cityDisplay}
Min: {item.minTemp} - Max: {item.maxTemp} oC
20% 18km/h East
); } export default Today;
